column1: Estelmo was the squire to Isildurs eldest son Elendur (son of Isildur).

column2: Estelmo accompanied Elendur and Isildur north along the eastern slopes of the Misty Mountains. They were Disaster of the Gladden Fields by Orcs
column3: and after a blow to the head Estelmo was believed dead. Stunned
column4: the young man survived and was found under Elendurs body.  Estelmo recuperated
column5: and was one of only three Men to survive the Disaster in which Isildur and the One Ring were lost.  He was able to report the words of Isildur and Elendur when they parted.
